QuestData.Title: Make Haste to Stormwind!
QuestData.RewardText: Veterans of Northrend, King Wrynn and the Alliance need your help! Stormwind and the Alliance face unprecedented threats from Deathwing and his Twilight's Hammer minions!$B$BPlease find the enclosed hearthstone and use it to transport yourself to Stormwind. The crown has arranged lodging for all returning heroes at The Golden Keg in the Dwarven District.
